title: Morse demonstrates telegraph 1876 Alexander Graham Bell patents the telephone 1897 Marconi patents a complete wireless telegraph system 1906 Lee DeForest invents the triode amplifier

note: Claude Shannon publishes Mathematical Theory of Communications 1956 First transoceanic telephone cable
title: Bell System completes a transcontinental telephone line 1918 B.H. Armstrong perfects the superheterodyne receiver 1937 Alec Reeves conceives pulse code modulation 1938 Television broadcasting begins WW II Radar and microwave systems are developed 1948 The transistor is invented

note: is launched 1962-66 High speed digital communications
title: First communications satellite, Telstar I
Mariner IV transmits pictures from Mars to Earth 1970 Color TV 1970 Commercial relay satellite telecommunications 1975 Intercontinental computer communication networks
